## suggest() function

Add the given item to the given list if it does not exist on the list already.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function suggest(list: Array<any>, item: any, insertAtHead?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  list | Array&lt;any&gt; | List to add to |
|  item | any | Item to add |
|  insertAtHead | boolean | If true, insert new item at head. Defaults to false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
